Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClientConnection
public class ClientSocket extends Object implements IClientConnection
ClientSocket class used to manage the Socket connection to the server.

  • Method Details

    • openStreams

      public void openStreams() throws IOException
      openStreams method creates a new socket and initializes it. Then it starts the startReceiving method
      Throws:
      IOException

    • startClient

      public void startClient()
      startClient method is used to start the client. It opens the streams and then calls the userLogin method

    • chooseTiles

      public void chooseTiles(String token, List<String> tilesChosen)
      chooseTiles method is used to create a request with the choice of tiles to be sent to the server. After sending the request, it begins waiting for a response.
      Specified by:
      chooseTiles in interface IClientConnection
      Parameters:
      token - - the token used to identify the client.
      tilesChosen - - the choice of tiles.

    • login

      public void login(String name)
      login method is used to create a login request and pass the username to the server. After sending the request, it begins waiting for a response.
      Specified by:
      login in interface IClientConnection
      Parameters:
      name - - username chosen by the client.

      Parameters:

    • setReceivedResponse

      public void setReceivedResponse(boolean b)
      setReceivedResponse signals whether a response has been received. If so, it stops the waits.
      Specified by:
      setReceivedResponse in interface IClientConnection
      Parameters:
      b - - boolean used to know whether the socket has received a response or not

    • numberOfPlayers

      public void numberOfPlayers(String name, String tokenA, int number)
      numberOfPlayers method generates a request to create the waiting room.
      Specified by:
      numberOfPlayers in interface IClientConnection
      Parameters:
      name - - username of the client.
      tokenA - - token used to identify the client who's sending the request.
      number - - number of players for the next match.

      Specified by:
      isSyn in interface IClientConnection

    • setSynCheckTimer

      public void setSynCheckTimer(boolean startTimer)
      method setSynCheckTimer starts a timer waiting for the ping from the server. When a ping is received, the timer is reset. If the timer expires and no ping has been received by the client, it means that the server is unreachable
      Specified by:
      setSynCheckTimer in interface IClientConnection
      Parameters:
      startTimer - - boolean signalling whether to start the timer or to reset it

    • sendAck

      public void sendAck()
      method sendAck is used to send a response ack message to the server after receiving a ping
      Specified by:
      sendAck in interface IClientConnection
